Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of Visa Officer's decision on misrepresentation
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant held accountable despite blaming consultant
Crimes.Evidence_Type: FOSS (Foreign National Offshore System) records, application documents
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Omission of U.S. residency and work history
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Materiality of omitted information to admissibility
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Misrepresentation or withholding material facts under IRPA
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Was the Visa Officer’s decision reasonable?
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Omission of material facts in permanent residence application
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Reliance on FOSS data to verify applicant’s history
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant’s reliance on consultant not excusing omission

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to disclose material facts under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of Visa Officer's decision on failure to disclose material facts
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant held responsible for signed application
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Non-disclosure of U.S. residency and work history
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Materiality of undisclosed information to admissibility assessment
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Withholding material facts under IRPA s.40(1)(a)
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Inadmissible due to failure to disclose material facts
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Was the Visa Officer’s determination reasonable?
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Omission and misrepresentation of material facts in permanent residence application
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Use of FOSS to detect discrepancies
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Claim of consultant error not accepted as defense
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Attribution of errors to immigration consultant
